name: Sunless Land (tastegood)
description:
A game made for ArtCenter Game Jam. 

2D Side-view FPS and Tower-defence Game.

Story about a lonely person driving his ship through the dark, protecting the furnace, and eventrually sees the sunrise at the other side.

Now go. Penetrate the darkness. Feed your furnace, and become your own sun.

Author: Zifeng Ding(ACCD Game Student), Jingyi Chen(ACCD Game Student)
